name: Slimy .IO: Snake Snither MMO -Run, Eat Color Dot
name_original: Slimy .IO: Snake Snither MMO -Run, Eat Color Dot
description:
Play ONLINE as a snake, with hundreds of other REAL players, in this FAST-PACED real-time multiplayer game!
Name your Snake, grow longer, and CHAT with other real online players. Make teams with other players, and sometimes betray them (MUAHAHAH). It's REALLY fun! Seriously, don't even trust us, try it!

//NEW: ////////////////////////////////
-We've re-built our game servers, smoothly allowing up to 500 players per ONE GAME! (It's tough to be #1 now!)
-Snakes can now be 2X longer than before! (have fun coiling!)
-New 'TOP PLAYER OF THE DAY', and 'reached length' shown on death
-tweaked speed boost, so it can be used continuously
-improved game controls
-Improved game graphics performance! (Much less lag!)
If you like this update, please don't hesitate to leave a review! (We read em' all!)
////////////////////////////////

This game is easy to pick up, with great online gameplay and stunning live-rendered graphics. You'll find it hard to put down!
////////////////////////////////
Got some great update ideas? Leave a review, we read them all, and love your feedback! (Good or bad!) You can contact us at http://blobz.io/contact.
An internet connection is required to play.
